SELECT distinct
FROM t_sales_order t_sales_order
INNER JOIN t_sales_order_mat t_sales_order_mat ON t_sales_order.sales_order_id = t_sales_order_mat.sales_order_id INNER JOIN t_base_mat t_base_mat ON t_sales_order_mat.mat_id = t_base_mat.mat_id LEFT JOIN t_purchase_request_order_detail t_purchase_request_order_detail ON t_purchase_request_order_detail.sales_order_mat_id = t_sales_order_mat.sales_order_mat_id
WHERE t_sales_order.deleted_flag = 0
AND (t_purchase_request_order_detail.status IS NULL OR t_purchase_request_order_detail.status != 1) AND t_base_mat.source_property = 'MAT_SOURCE_PROPERTY_1'

SELECT , t_base_cust.cust_name, t_base_bom.product_code, t_base_bom.product_name, t_base_bom.cust_product_code, t_base_bom.cust_product_name, t_base_bom.series_name, t_base_bom.product_color, t_base_bom.product_eng_color, t_base_bom.product_class, t_base_bom.product_image, t_sales_order_detail.order_qty, t_sales_order_detail.production_qty, t_sales_order_detail.unit_price, t_sales_order_detail.tax_unit_price, t_sales_order_detail.amount, t_sales_order_detail.tax_total_amount, t_sales_order_detail.remark, t_sales_order_detail.tax_amount FROM t_sales_order t_sales_order LEFT JOIN t_base_cust t_base_cust on t_sales_order.cust_id = t_base_cust.cust_id LEFT JOIN t_sales_order_detail t_sales_order_detail on t_sales_order.sales_order_id = t_sales_order_detail.sales_order_id AND t_sales_order_detail.deleted_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN t_base_bom t_base_bom on t_sales_order_detail.bom_id = t_base_bom.bom_id WHERE t_sales_order.deleted_flag = 0

SELECT , t_base_cust.cust_name FROM t_sales_order t_sales_order LEFT JOIN t_base_cust t_base_cust on t_sales_order.cust_id = t_base_cust.cust_id WHERE t_sales_order.sales_order_id = #{salesOrderId} and t_sales_order.deleted_flag = 0
